mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LF_DMUSER.TB_RESN_DAY_CLOSE WHERE RESN_PROC_DAY = #{resn_proc_day} AND DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT A.ACCNT_NO /* 회원번호 */ , A.MEM_NM /* 성명 */ , A.PROD_NM /* 상품명 */ , A.JOIN_DT /* 가입일자 */ , A.DAMDANG , A.DEPT_NM , A.RESN_ACPT_DAY /* 해약등록일 */ , A.RESN_PROC_DAY /* 해약처리일 */ , A.RESN_SEND_DAY /* 해약송금일 */ , FN_COM_NM('82',A.RESON) AS RESON /* 고객사유 */ , A.COMP_RESON , A.RESN_MTHD /* 해약환급방법 */ , A.BANK_ACCNT_NO /* 계좌번호 */ , A.BANK_CD /* 은행코드 */ , A.BANK_NM /* 은행명 */ , A.DEPR /* 예금주 */ , A.DEPR_INFO /* 은행명 계좌번호 예금주 */ , A.RELT /* 관계 */ , FN_COM_NM('64',A.RESN_CL) AS RESN_CL /* 해약구분 */ , DECODE(A.RESN_PROC_YN,'Y','처리','미대상') AS RESN_PROC_YN /* 해약처리여부 */ , A.DOCUMENT , A.TRUE_CNT AS TRUE_CNT /* 상조회차 */ , A.TRUE_AMT AS TRUE_AMT /* 상조금액 */ , A.MONTH_TRUE_AMT AS MONTH_TRUE_AMT /* 월상조통계금액 */ , A.REL_AMT AS REL_AMT /* 결합금액 */ , A.MONTH_REL_AMT /* 월결합통계금액 */ , A.ADD_AMT AS ADD_AMT /* 추가금액 */ , A.GONGJE_AMT /* 공제금액 */ , A.NEW_CHAN_GUNSU /* 특별할인회차 */ , A.PRE_DC , A.RESN_PAY_AMT /* 실지급금액 */ , A.RESN_PLUS /* 해약수익금 */ , A.SHOPPING_USE_AMT /* 쇼핑몰사용금액 */ FROM LF_DMUSER.TB_RESN_DAY_CLOSE A WHERE 1=1 AND A.RESN_PROC_DAY = #{resn_proc_day} AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY A.ACCNT_NO

WITH RESN_TBL AS (SELECT /* DlwItoMngMap.getResnDayCloseListCount2 */ ACCNT_NO , RESN_CL , RESN_PROC_YN , CALC_MTHD , MEM_NM , PROD_CD , PROD_NM , JOIN_DT , '0' AS DAMDANG , '0' AS DEPT_NM , RESN_ACPT_DAY , RESN_PROC_DAY , '0' AS RESN_SEND_DAY , FN_COM_NM('82',RESON) AS RESON , '0' AS COMP_RESON , '0' AS RESN_MTHD , BANK_ACCNT_NO , BANK_CD , BANK_NM , DEPR , BANK_NM||BANK_ACCNT_NO||DEPR AS DEPR_INFO , '0' AS RELT , '' AS DOCUMENT , TRUE_CNT , REL_CNT , ADD_CNT , (SELECT SUM(AMT) FROM PRODUCT_NO_DATA WHERE PROD_CD = AA.PROD_CD AND NO <= TRUE_CNT) AS TRUE_AMT , (SELECT SUM(REL_AMT) FROM PRODUCT_NO_DATA WHERE PROD_CD = AA.PROD_CD AND NO <= REL_CNT) AS REL_AMT , (SELECT SUM(ADD_AMT) FROM PRODUCT_NO_DATA WHERE PROD_CD = AA.PROD_CD AND NO <= ADD_CNT) AS ADD_AMT , '0' AS GONGJE_AMT , NEW_CHAN_GUNSU , '0' AS PRE_DC , RESN_PAY_AMT , RESN_PLUS , SHOPPING_USE_AMT FROM ( SELECT RS.ACCNT_NO , RS.RESN_CL , RS.RESN_PROC_YN , RS.CALC_MTHD , MB.MEM_NM , PD.PROD_CD , PD.PROD_NM , MPA.JOIN_DT , RS.RESN_ACPT_DAY , RS.RESN_PROC_DAY , FN_COM_NM('82',RESON) AS RESON , RS.BANK_ACCNT_NO , RS.BANK_CD , RS.BANK_NM , RS.DEPR , RS.BANK_NM||RS.BANK_ACCNT_NO||RS.DEPR AS DEPR_INFO , CASE WHEN TRUE_DAY >= #{resn_proc_day} THEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PAY_MNG WHERE ACCNT_NO = RS.ACCNT_NO AND DEL_FG = 'N' AND PAY_DAY <= #{resn_proc_day}) ELSE TRUE_CNT END AS TRUE_CNT , CASE WHEN REL_DAY >= #{resn_proc_day} THEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PAY_MNG_DTL WHERE ACCNT_NO = RS.ACCNT_NO AND DEL_FG = 'N' AND PAY_DAY <= #{resn_proc_day}) ELSE REL_CNT END AS REL_CNT
, CASE WHEN ADD_DAY >= #{resn_proc_day} THEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PAY_MNG_DTL1 WHERE ACCNT_NO = RS.ACCNT_NO AND DEL_FG = 'N' AND PAY_DAY <= #{resn_proc_day}) ELSE ADD_CNT END AS ADD_CNT , MPA.NEW_CHAN_GUNSU , RS.RESN_PAY_AMT , RS.RESN_PLUS , RS.SHOPPING_USE_AMT , CASE WHEN RS.RESN_CL = '01' AND RS.RESON != '23' AND RS.RESN_PROC_YN = 'Y' THEN 'Y' WHEN RS.RESN_CL = '03' AND RS.RESN_PROC_YN = 'Y' THEN 'Y' WHEN RS.RESN_CL = '04' AND RS.RESN_PROC_YN = 'Y' THEN 'Y' WHEN RS.RESN_CL = '02' AND RS.RESON != '23' THEN 'Y' WHEN RS.RESON = '23' AND RESN_PROC_YN = 'Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS ROW_YN FROM RESCISSION RS INNER JOIN TB_MEMBER_BASIC_INFO_DAY MPA ON RS.ACCNT_NO = MPA.ACCNT_NO INNER JOIN MEMBER MB ON MPA.MEM_NO = MB.MEM_NO AND MB.DEL_FG = 'N' INNER JOIN PRODUCT PD ON MPA.PROD_CD = PD.PROD_CD WHERE 1=1 AND RS.DEL_FG = 'N' AND RS.RESN_PROC_DAY = #{resn_proc_day} ) AA WHERE 1=1 AND ROW_YN = 'Y' ) SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESN_TBL

WITH RESN_TBL AS (SELECT /* DlwItoMngMap.getResnDayCloseListCount2 */ ACCNT_NO , RESN_CL , RESN_PROC_YN , CALC_MTHD , MEM_NM , PROD_CD , PROD_NM , JOIN_DT , '0' AS DAMDANG , '0' AS DEPT_NM , RESN_ACPT_DAY , RESN_PROC_DAY , '0' AS RESN_SEND_DAY , RESON , '0' AS COMP_RESON , '0' AS RESN_MTHD , BANK_ACCNT_NO , BANK_CD , BANK_NM , DEPR , BANK_NM||BANK_ACCNT_NO||DEPR AS DEPR_INFO , '0' AS RELT , '' AS DOCUMENT , TRUE_CNT , REL_CNT , ADD_CNT , (SELECT SUM(AMT) FROM PRODUCT_NO_DATA WHERE PROD_CD = AA.PROD_CD AND NO <= TRUE_CNT) AS TRUE_AMT , (SELECT SUM(REL_AMT) FROM PRODUCT_NO_DATA WHERE PROD_CD = AA.PROD_CD AND NO <= REL_CNT) AS REL_AMT , (SELECT SUM(ADD_AMT) FROM PRODUCT_NO_DATA WHERE PROD_CD = AA.PROD_CD AND NO <= ADD_CNT) AS ADD_AMT , '0' AS GONGJE_AMT , NEW_CHAN_GUNSU , '0' AS PRE_DC , RESN_PAY_AMT , RESN_PLUS , SHOPPING_USE_AMT FROM ( SELECT RS.ACCNT_NO , RS.RESN_CL , RS.RESN_PROC_YN , RS.CALC_MTHD , MB.MEM_NM , PD.PROD_CD , PD.PROD_NM , MPA.JOIN_DT , RS.RESN_ACPT_DAY , RS.RESN_PROC_DAY , FN_COM_NM('82',RESON) AS RESON , RS.BANK_ACCNT_NO , RS.BANK_CD , RS.BANK_NM , RS.DEPR , RS.BANK_NM||RS.BANK_ACCNT_NO||RS.DEPR AS DEPR_INFO , CASE WHEN TRUE_DAY >= #{resn_proc_day} THEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PAY_MNG WHERE ACCNT_NO = RS.ACCNT_NO AND DEL_FG = 'N' AND PAY_DAY <= #{resn_proc_day}) ELSE TRUE_CNT END AS TRUE_CNT , CASE WHEN REL_DAY >= #{resn_proc_day} THEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PAY_MNG_DTL WHERE ACCNT_NO = RS.ACCNT_NO AND DEL_FG = 'N' AND PAY_DAY <= #{resn_proc_day}) ELSE REL_CNT END AS REL_CNT
, CASE WHEN ADD_DAY >= #{resn_proc_day} THEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PAY_MNG_DTL1 WHERE ACCNT_NO = RS.ACCNT_NO AND DEL_FG = 'N' AND PAY_DAY <= #{resn_proc_day}) ELSE ADD_CNT END AS ADD_CNT , MPA.NEW_CHAN_GUNSU , RS.RESN_PAY_AMT , RS.RESN_PLUS , RS.SHOPPING_USE_AMT , CASE WHEN RS.RESN_CL = '01' AND RS.RESON != '23' AND RS.RESN_PROC_YN = 'Y' THEN 'Y' WHEN RS.RESN_CL = '03' AND RS.RESN_PROC_YN = 'Y' THEN 'Y' WHEN RS.RESN_CL = '04' AND RS.RESN_PROC_YN = 'Y' THEN 'Y' WHEN RS.RESN_CL = '02' AND RS.RESON != '23' THEN 'Y' WHEN RS.RESON = '23' AND RESN_PROC_YN = 'Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS ROW_YN FROM RESCISSION RS INNER JOIN TB_MEMBER_BASIC_INFO_DAY MPA ON RS.ACCNT_NO = MPA.ACCNT_NO INNER JOIN MEMBER MB ON MPA.MEM_NO = MB.MEM_NO AND MB.DEL_FG = 'N' INNER JOIN PRODUCT PD ON MPA.PROD_CD = PD.PROD_CD WHERE 1=1 AND RS.DEL_FG = 'N' AND RS.RESN_PROC_DAY = #{resn_proc_day} ) AA WHERE 1=1 AND ROW_YN = 'Y' ) SELECT ACCNT_NO , MEM_NM , PROD_CD , PROD_NM , JOIN_DT , DAMDANG , DEPT_NM , RESN_ACPT_DAY , RESN_PROC_DAY , RESN_SEND_DAY , RESON , COMP_RESON , RESN_MTHD , BANK_ACCNT_NO , BANK_CD , BANK_NM , DEPR , DEPR_INFO , RELT , RESN_CL , RESN_PROC_YN , DOCUMENT , TRUE_CNT , REL_CNT , ADD_CNT , TRUE_AMT , ROUND(TRUE_AMT/TRUE_CNT,0) AS MONTH_TRUE_AMT , REL_AMT , ROUND(REL_AMT / REL_CNT,0) AS MONTH_REL_AMT , ADD_AMT , GONGJE_AMT , NEW_CHAN_GUNSU , PRE_DC , RESN_PAY_AMT , RESN_PLUS , SHOPPING_USE_AMT FROM RESN_TBL ORDER BY ACCNT_NO
mapper.insert:
INSERT /* DlwItoMngMap.insertResnDayClose */ INTO TB_RESN_DAY_CLOSE ( ACCNT_NO , MEM_NM , PROD_NM , JOIN_DT , DAMDANG , DEPT_NM , RESN_ACPT_DAY , RESN_PROC_DAY , RESN_SEND_DAY , RESON , COMP_RESON , RESN_MTHD , BANK_ACCNT_NO , BANK_CD , BANK_NM , DEPR , DEPR_INFO , RELT , RESN_CL , RESN_PROC_YN , DOCUMENT , TRUE_CNT , TRUE_AMT , MONTH_TRUE_AMT , REL_AMT , MONTH_REL_AMT , ADD_AMT , GONGJE_AMT , NEW_CHAN_GUNSU , PRE_DC , RESN_PAY_AMT , RESN_PLUS , SHOPPING_USE_AMT , REG_MAN , REG_DM , UPD_MAN , UPD_DM , DEL_YN ) WITH RESN_TBL AS (SELECT /* DlwItoMngMap.getResnDayCloseListCount2 */ ACCNT_NO , RESN_CL , RESN_PROC_YN , CALC_MTHD , MEM_NM , PROD_CD , PROD_NM , JOIN_DT , '0' AS DAMDANG , '0' AS DEPT_NM , RESN_ACPT_DAY , RESN_PROC_DAY , '0' AS RESN_SEND_DAY , FN_COM_NM('82',RESON) AS RESON , '0' AS COMP_RESON , '0' AS RESN_MTHD , BANK_ACCNT_NO , BANK_CD , BANK_NM , DEPR , BANK_NM||BANK_ACCNT_NO||DEPR AS DEPR_INFO , '0' AS RELT , '' AS DOCUMENT , TRUE_CNT , REL_CNT , ADD_CNT , (SELECT SUM(AMT) FROM PRODUCT_NO_DATA WHERE PROD_CD = AA.PROD_CD AND NO <= TRUE_CNT) AS TRUE_AMT , (SELECT SUM(REL_AMT) FROM PRODUCT_NO_DATA WHERE PROD_CD = AA.PROD_CD AND NO <= REL_CNT) AS REL_AMT , (SELECT SUM(ADD_AMT) FROM PRODUCT_NO_DATA WHERE PROD_CD = AA.PROD_CD AND NO <= ADD_CNT) AS ADD_AMT , '0' AS GONGJE_AMT , NEW_CHAN_GUNSU , '0' AS PRE_DC , RESN_PAY_AMT , RESN_PLUS , SHOPPING_USE_AMT FROM ( SELECT RS.ACCNT_NO , RS.RESN_CL , RS.RESN_PROC_YN , RS.CALC_MTHD , MB.MEM_NM , PD.PROD_CD , PD.PROD_NM , MPA.JOIN_DT , RS.RESN_ACPT_DAY , RS.RESN_PROC_DAY , FN_COM_NM('82',RESON) AS RESON , RS.BANK_ACCNT_NO , RS.BANK_CD , RS.BANK_NM , RS.DEPR , RS.BANK_NM||RS.BANK_ACCNT_NO||RS.DEPR AS DEPR_INFO , CASE WHEN TRUE_DAY >= #{resn_proc_day} THEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PAY_MNG WHERE ACCNT_NO = RS.ACCNT_NO AND DEL_FG = 'N' AND PAY_DAY <= #{resn_proc_day}) ELSE TRUE_CNT END AS TRUE_CNT , CASE WHEN REL_DAY >= #{resn_proc_day} THEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PAY_MNG_DTL WHERE ACCNT_NO = RS.ACCNT_NO AND DEL_FG = 'N' AND PAY_DAY <= #{resn_proc_day}) ELSE REL_CNT END AS REL_CNT
, CASE WHEN ADD_DAY >= #{resn_proc_day} THEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PAY_MNG_DTL1 WHERE ACCNT_NO = RS.ACCNT_NO AND DEL_FG = 'N' AND PAY_DAY <= #{resn_proc_day}) ELSE ADD_CNT END AS ADD_CNT , MPA.NEW_CHAN_GUNSU , RS.RESN_PAY_AMT , RS.RESN_PLUS , RS.SHOPPING_USE_AMT , CASE WHEN RS.RESN_CL = '01' AND RS.RESON != '23' AND RS.RESN_PROC_YN = 'Y' THEN 'Y' WHEN RS.RESN_CL = '03' AND RS.RESN_PROC_YN = 'Y' THEN 'Y' WHEN RS.RESN_CL = '04' AND RS.RESN_PROC_YN = 'Y' THEN 'Y' WHEN RS.RESN_CL = '02' AND RS.RESON != '23' THEN 'Y' WHEN RS.RESON = '23' AND RESN_PROC_YN = 'Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS ROW_YN FROM RESCISSION RS INNER JOIN TB_MEMBER_BASIC_INFO_DAY MPA ON RS.ACCNT_NO = MPA.ACCNT_NO INNER JOIN MEMBER MB ON MPA.MEM_NO = MB.MEM_NO AND MB.DEL_FG = 'N' INNER JOIN PRODUCT PD ON MPA.PROD_CD = PD.PROD_CD WHERE 1=1 AND RS.DEL_FG = 'N' AND RS.RESN_PROC_DAY = #{resn_proc_day} ) AA WHERE 1=1 AND ROW_YN = 'Y' ) SELECT ACCNT_NO , MEM_NM , PROD_NM , JOIN_DT , DAMDANG , DEPT_NM , RESN_ACPT_DAY , RESN_PROC_DAY , RESN_SEND_DAY , RESON , COMP_RESON , RESN_MTHD , BANK_ACCNT_NO , BANK_CD , BANK_NM , DEPR , DEPR_INFO , RELT , RESN_CL , RESN_PROC_YN , DOCUMENT , TRUE_CNT , TRUE_AMT , ROUND(TRUE_AMT/TRUE_CNT,0) , REL_AMT , ROUND(REL_AMT / REL_CNT,0) , ADD_AMT , GONGJE_AMT , NEW_CHAN_GUNSU , PRE_DC , RESN_PAY_AMT , RESN_PLUS , SHOPPING_USE_AMT , #{reg_man} , SYSDATE , #{reg_man} , SYSDATE , 'N' FROM RESN_TBL
mapper.select: SELECT A.DT FROM (SELECT TO_CHAR(SDT + LEVEL - 1 , 'YYYYMMDD') DT , TO_CHAR(SDT + LEVEL - 1, 'D') D FROM (SELECT TO_DATE((TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')||'01-01'),'YYYY-MM-DD') SDT , TO_DATE((TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, 12), 'YYYY')||'12-31'),'YYYY-MM-DD') EDT FROM DUAL ) CONNECT BY LEVEL <= EDT - SDT +1 ) A , ( SELECT HOLI_DAY DT FROM PS_WILLVI.TB_IVR_HOLIDAY_MNG WHERE SUBSTR(HOLI_DAY,0,4) >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY') ) B WHERE TO_DATE(A.DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') = B.DT(+) AND TO_DATE(A.DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') > #{req_today} AND A.D NOT IN ('1','7') AND B.DT IS NULL ORDER BY A.DT ASC

SELECT /* DlwItoMngMap.getDebtDtlList */ MST_SEQ, DEBT_DT, ACCNT_NO, DEBT_TOT_AMT, DEBT_YEN_CNT, DEBT_REL_AMT, DEBT_DIFF_AMT, CANCEL_YN, CANCEL_DT, REAL_YEN_CNT, REAL_REL_AMT, (REAL_TOT_AMT - REAL_REL_AMT) AS REAL_DIFF_AMT FROM ( SELECT MST_SEQ, DEBT_DT, ACCNT_NO, DEBT_TOT_AMT, DEBT_YEN_CNT, DEBT_REL_AMT, (DEBT_TOT_AMT - DEBT_REL_AMT) AS DEBT_DIFF_AMT, CANCEL_YN, CANCEL_DT,
CASE WHEN TBL1.MONTH_CNT >= TOT_REL_CNT THEN TOT_REL_CNT - TBL1.REL_CNT ELSE TBL1.MONTH_CNT - TBL1.REL_CNT END AS REAL_YEN_CNT,
(SELECT SUM(REL_AMT) + SUM(ADD_AMT) FROM PRODUCT_NO_DATA WHERE PROD_CD = TBL1.PROD_CD AND NO <= TBL1.REL_CNT) AS REAL_REL_AMT,
CASE WHEN TBL1.MONTH_CNT >= TOT_REL_CNT THEN (SELECT SUM(REL_AMT) + SUM(ADD_AMT) FROM PRODUCT_NO_DATA WHERE PROD_CD = TBL1.PROD_CD) ELSE (SELECT SUM(REL_AMT) + SUM(ADD_AMT) FROM PRODUCT_NO_DATA WHERE PROD_CD = TBL1.PROD_CD AND NO <= TBL1.MONTH_CNT) END AS REAL_TOT_AMT FROM ( SELECT DR.MST_SEQ, DR.DEBT_DT, DR.ACCNT_NO, DR.REL_CNT AS DEBT_REL_CNT, (SELECT SUM(REL_AMT) + SUM(ADD_AMT) FROM PRODUCT_NO_DATA WHERE PROD_CD = MBID.PROD_CD AND NO <= DR.MONTH_COUNT) AS DEBT_TOT_AMT, (SELECT SUM(REL_AMT) + SUM(ADD_AMT) FROM PRODUCT_NO_DATA WHERE PROD_CD = MBID.PROD_CD AND NO <= DR.REL_CNT ) AS DEBT_REL_AMT, (DR.MONTH_COUNT - DR.REL_CNT) AS DEBT_YEN_CNT, DR.SAFE_KEY, CANCEL_YN, CANCEL_DT, MBID.PROD_CD, (TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM')||'01',SUBSTR(MBID.JOIN_DT,0,6) || '01')+1)) AS MONTH_CNT, NVL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PAY_MNG_DTL WHERE ACCNT_NO = MBID.ACCNT_NO AND DEL_FG = 'N'),0) AS REL_CNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT_NO_DATA WHERE PROD_CD = MBID.PROD_CD AND REL_AMT > 0) AS TOT_REL_CNT FROM TB_DEBT_REG DR INNER JOIN MEM_PROD_ACCNT MBID ON DR.ACCNT_NO = MBID.ACCNT_NO WHERE 1=1 AND DR.MST_SEQ = #{mst_seq} ) TBL1 ) MAIN

SELECT /*DlwItoMngMap.getDebtPayInfo */ MAIN.NO, TRUE_PAY_AMT, RELAT_PAY_AMT, ADD_PAY_AMT, (TRUE_PAY_AMT + RELAT_PAY_AMT + ADD_PAY_AMT) AS TOT_AMT, TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(JOIN_DT, NO -1),'YYYYMMDD') AS MON_NO, ( CASE WHEN STAT = 0 THEN '정상' WHEN STAT = 1 THEN '선납' ELSE '연체' END ) AS STAT_NM, CASE WHEN TRUE_PAY_AMT > 0 THEN PAY_DAY1 WHEN TRUE_PAY_AMT = 0 AND RELAT_PAY_AMT > 0 THEN PAY_DAY2 ELSE PAY_DAY3 END AS PAY_DAY, CASE WHEN TRUE_PAY_AMT > 0 THEN LF_DMUSER.FN_COM_NM('01', MAIN.PAY_MTHD1) WHEN TRUE_PAY_AMT = 0 AND RELAT_PAY_AMT > 0 THEN LF_DMUSER.FN_COM_NM('01', MAIN.PAY_MTHD2) ELSE LF_DMUSER.FN_COM_NM('01', MAIN.PAY_MTHD3) END AS PAY_MTHD_NM FROM ( SELECT ACCNT_NO, NO, MAX(JOIN_DT) AS JOIN_DT, MAX((CASE WHEN PAY_GNB = 'PM' THEN PAY_AMT ELSE 0 END)) AS TRUE_PAY_AMT, MAX((CASE WHEN PAY_GNB = 'PM1' THEN PAY_AMT ELSE 0 END)) AS RELAT_PAY_AMT, MAX((CASE WHEN PAY_GNB = 'PM2' THEN PAY_AMT ELSE 0 END)) AS ADD_PAY_AMT, MIN((CASE WHEN PAY_GNB = 'PM' THEN PAY_DAY ELSE '99999999' END)) AS PAY_DAY1, MIN((CASE WHEN PAY_GNB = 'PM1' THEN PAY_DAY ELSE '99999999' END)) AS PAY_DAY2, MIN((CASE WHEN PAY_GNB = 'PM2' THEN PAY_DAY ELSE '99999999' END)) AS PAY_DAY3, MIN((CASE WHEN PAY_GNB = 'PM' THEN STAT ELSE 9 END)) AS STAT, MIN((CASE WHEN PAY_GNB = 'PM' THEN PAY_MTHD ELSE '99' END)) AS PAY_MTHD1, MIN((CASE WHEN PAY_GNB = 'PM1' THEN PAY_MTHD ELSE '99' END)) AS PAY_MTHD2, MIN((CASE WHEN PAY_GNB = 'PM2' THEN PAY_MTHD ELSE '99' END)) AS PAY_MTHD3, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY NO DESC, PAY_DAY DESC) AS PAGE_INDX FROM ( SELECT MPA.ACCNT_NO, MPA.JOIN_DT, 'PM' AS PAY_GNB, PM.PAY_MTHD, PM.STAT, PM.NO, PM.PAY_AMT, PM.PAY_DAY FROM LF_DMUSER.MEM_PROD_ACCNT MPA LEFT OUTER JOIN LF_DMUSER.PAY_MNG PM ON MPA.ACCNT_NO = PM.ACCNT_NO AND PM.DEL_FG = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND MPA.ACCNT_NO = #{accnt_no} AND MPA.DEL_FG = 'N'
UNION ALL
SELECT MPA.ACCNT_NO, MPA.JOIN_DT, 'PM1' AS PAY_GNB, PM.PAY_MTHD, PM.STAT, PM.NO, PM.PAY_AMT, PM.PAY_DAY FROM LF_DMUSER.MEM_PROD_ACCNT MPA LEFT OUTER JOIN LF_DMUSER.PAY_MNG_DTL PM ON MPA.ACCNT_NO = PM.ACCNT_NO AND PM.DEL_FG = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND MPA.ACCNT_NO = #{accnt_no} AND MPA.DEL_FG = 'N'
UNION ALL
SELECT MPA.ACCNT_NO, MPA.JOIN_DT, 'PM2' AS PAY_GNB, PM.PAY_MTHD, PM.STAT, PM.NO, PM.PAY_AMT, PM.PAY_DAY FROM LF_DMUSER.MEM_PROD_ACCNT MPA LEFT OUTER JOIN LF_DMUSER.PAY_MNG_DTL1 PM ON MPA.ACCNT_NO = PM.ACCNT_NO AND PM.DEL_FG = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND MPA.ACCNT_NO = #{accnt_no} AND MPA.DEL_FG = 'N' ) GROUP BY ACCNT_NO, NO, PAY_DAY HAVING NO > 0 ) MAIN ORDER BY MAIN.NO DESC
